name: Fridge Organizer!
description:
Welcome to Fridge Organizer!

Play as the Fridge Organizer, a diligent creature whose life purpose is to do one thing - organize the fridge!

Use your mouse and scroll wheel to move the Fridge Organizer's Organ-Izer to put as many items into the fridge before time runs out!

Post your Highscores in the comments!

Made for the Weekly Game Jam #252 "Food" Jam.
